title: ICE: task 'rustc' failed at 'internal error: entered unreachable code', /home/tj/rust-lang/src/librustc/middle/check_match.rs:714

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
``` rust
fn main() {
    match "ab".to_string().as_bytes() {
        b"\n" => (),
        [b1, b2] => (),
        _ => ()
    }
}
```
